title: Anti-LGI1 encephalitis and Langerhans cell histiocytosis: Two associated entities? A case report
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Denise Cerne, Federico Massa, Marco Mora, Silvia Morbelli, Luca Roccatagliata, Giacomo Rebella, Flavio Villani, Federica Bozzano, Antonio Uccelli, Luana Benedetti, Corrado Cabona
